main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in the vicinity of Silver Lake, California on August 26, 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as spherical and brilliantly illuminated., It halted momentarily in a flat trajectory before turning sharply and entering a steep climb., The object was observed for a duration of 3-5 seconds., A Victor-shaped contrail appeared for one second after the steep climb began., There was no known air activity or meteorological disturbances at the time of the observation.
